data.comment: In the minute 0, The match goes to penalties!
Cristian Dajome (Vancouver) misses his penalty attempt!
Alan Pulido (Kansas City) scores from the penalty spot.
In the minute 0, Leonard Owusu (Vancouver) succeeds from the penalty spot.
Ilie Sanchez (Kansas City) scores!
A devastated Derek Cornelius (Vancouver) misses and walks back to his team mates.
In the minute 0, Daniel Salloi (Kansas City) fails to convert his penalty!
Yordy Reyna (Vancouver) misses!
Gianluca Busio (Kansas City) converts his penalty!
In the minute 0, It's 3-1 at the end of the penalty shootout.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Vancouver at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In the minute 3, Victor Rivas signals a Kansas City throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Orlando, Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 5, Vancouver to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 9, Kansas City's Gadi Kinda has been booked in Orlando.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Vancouver's area.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Vancouver.
In Orlando Kansas City attack through Graham Zusi. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Vancouver at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 13, Victor Rivas signals a Kansas City throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Kansas City needs to be cautious. Vancouver have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 16, Free kick Vancouver.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 18, Kansas City push forward at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex and Gadi Kinda gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Vancouver defence.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Victor Rivas awards Vancouver a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
Graham Zusi of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Victor Rivas awards Vancouver a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gadi Kinda for Kansas City who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Gadi Kinda has recovered and rejoins the match in Orlando.
In the minute 23, Vancouver push upfield but Victor Rivas quickly pulls them for offside.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Vancouver.
In the minute 25, Roger Espinoza's header is off-target for Kansas City.
Goal kick for Vancouver at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 26, Kansas City are caught offside.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Kansas City's Alan Pulido is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Victor Rivas signals a Kansas City throw-in in Vancouver's half.
In the minute 34, Kansas City are coming forward and Gadi Kinda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Vancouver at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Kansas City at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.

Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Leonard Owusu of Vancouver smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Throw-in for Vancouver close to the penalty box.
Theo Bair (Vancouver) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Victor Rivas awards Vancouver a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Victor Rivas signals a Kansas City throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Vancouver's Cristian Dajome looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Kansas City!
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City's Graham Smith attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 45, Cristian Dajome is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Vancouver will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kansas City.

In the minute 72, Vancouver make their first substitution with Yordy Reyna replacing Theo Bair.

Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
